tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE AircraftMaintenanceRecords (
    aircraft_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    description VARCHAR(255),
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    recorded_by_user VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  aircraft_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (aircraft_id) REFERENCES Aircraft(aircraft_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Aircraft (
    aircraft_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    aircraft_type VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    year_of_manufacture INT,
    registration_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceRecords (
    maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    aircraft_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    description TEXT,
    engineer_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE aircraft ( 
  aircraft_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  registration_number VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, 
  manufacturer VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
  model VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL 
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_record ( 
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  aircraft_id INT NOT NULL, 
  maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL, 
  description TEXT, 
  FOREIGN KEY (aircraft_id) REFERENCES aircraft(aircraft_id) 
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_event ( 
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  record_id INT NOT NULL, 
  event_date DATE NOT NULL, 
  event_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
  FOREIGN KEY (record_id) REFERENCES maintenance_record(record_id) 
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_crew ( 
  crew_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  crew_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL 
)

CREATE TABLE event_crew_assignment ( 
  event_id INT NOT NULL, 
  crew_id INT NOT NULL, 
  PRIMARY KEY (event_id, crew_id), 
  FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES maintenance_event(event_id), 
  FOREIGN KEY (crew_id) REFERENCES maintenance_crew(crew_id) 
)
